CustomField.description: Returns the max number of employees affected reported on this RLCV. Used to roll up to the case to show the max number of employees affected for all RLCVs
CustomField.formula: MAX( No_of_employees_affected_failure_to_post__c, No_of_employees_affected_record_keeping__c, No_of_employees_affected_meal_period__c, No_of_employees_minimum_wage__c, No_of_employee_affected_unpaid_overtime__c, No_of_employees_affected_pay_stub__c, No_of_employees_affected_rest_break__c, No_of_employees_affected_business_expens__c, No_of_employees_affected_lactation_space__c, No_of_employees_affected_misclassficatio__c, No_of_employees_affected_other_violation__c, No_of_employees_affected_other_wage__c, No_of_employees_affected_pay_date__c, No_number_of_minors_affected__c)
CustomField.label: Max Affected Employees
